# wsgcolr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Functions to facilitate manipulation, visualization and analysis of Columbia River White Sturgeon telemetry and capture-recapture data.

## Installation

Install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("sebdalgarno/wsgcolr")
```
